title: 7,500 Mn water bills defaulted by April 2022: Water Board
body_lines: All consumers, including households, commercial enterprises, government agencies and schools owe the National Water Supply and Drainage Board (NWSDB) nearly Ra. 7,500 million by April 2022, officials revealed.

This was revealed during the the progress review meeting of the Ministry of Water Supply and Drainage chaired by President Gotabaya Rajapaksa at the President's House, Colombo, yesterday (15), President's Media Division said.
